title: To Bring Out Mutual Aid in Communities
description1:
Community activities are built on the power of mutual aid.
However, since taking action often doesn't lead to monetary value,
these activities tend to end without lasting long.
Even in voluntary communities, they eventually face capitalistic issues,
where decision-making power concentrates where capital accumulates.
This diminishes liquidity and vitality within the community.
Community currency provides a means to visualize and
evaluate mutual aid and contributions within various communities, such as local societies.
subtitle1:
Making it possible to express the value of social capital
that cannot be measured with conventional money
description2:
Specifically, PEACE COIN promotes circulation within communities through an algorithm called ARIGATO CREATION.
Community currency also functions as a governance tool,
allowing members to have a direct impact in a way that aligns consumption with voting.
description3:
However, creating such a currency from scratch is challenging.
PEACE COIN is a platform for digitalizing social capital as community currency.
It visualizes social capital within communities and encourages contributions and mutual support.
Users can promote value exchange within and outside communities by evaluating each other's social capital.
description4:
PEACE COIN also proposes a new governance model that brings transparency and fairness,
aiming for all participants to have substantial influence on community development.

arigatoCreation.title: What is ARIGATO CREATION
arigatoCreation.subtitle:
It is PEACE COIN's unique algorithm
that increases when payments
are made to value providers
arigatoCreation.description1: By decreasing unused tokens, the velocity of token circulation increases, enhancing the incentive to use tokens, which promotes economic activity.
arigatoCreation.description2: By using tokens that increase and decrease, not only does it stimulate economic activity across a wide range of communities, from individuals to companies, households, and local societies, but it also realizes the visualization, valuation, and liquidity of 'values not yet evaluated,' such as social capital and unpaid work like volunteering and household labor.

vision.title: Creating a Rich Society Where Diversity is Mutually Recognized
vision.description1:
The 'rich' society that the PEACE COIN platform aims for is
a society where diverse values circulate.
vision.description2:
Recognizing and circulating the unique contributions and values of each individual and community
leads to enhancing the sustainability of society.
This common understanding brings not only economic richness but also mental composure and purpose in life.
Through PEACE COIN's algorithm, we propose a new form of economic activity
that realizes balanced (harmonious) ways of earning and spending.
vision.subtitle1:
PEACE COIN's new value system is an approach
that prioritizes mutual aid and connections over savings
vision.description3:
PEACE COIN redefines the value and meaning of spending, rather than focusing solely on saving.
Unlike conventional capitalist societies where increased savings don't actually reduce anxiety,
PEACE COIN can reduce that anxiety by promoting mutual aid and contributions, connecting with the community.
This paradoxical approach provides an opportunity for people to experience the importance of
deeper human relationships and social connections, beyond traditional monetary values.
vision.subtitle2:
PEACE COIN reevaluates
people's socially contributive actions
vision.description4:
Service providers who receive PEACE COIN shift from traditional cost-performance focus to
values that prioritize sustainable services and the people in front of them.
This promotes altruistic behavior and reevaluates the role as a provider.
Paying more PEACE COIN deepens human relationships and trust, strengthening social connections.
These actions take economic activity a step further,
with the underlying desire to promote more fulfilling community formation at the core of PEACE COIN.
